user.confirm-account-request: Please confirm your account via the email you received after registering.
user.email-already-registered: Email already registered. Please sign in.
user.password-syntax-error: Invalid password syntax. Make sure it is longer than 10 characters, including a number, a lower case letter and an upper case letter, and a special character (e.g. @,#,!,$,%, etc.).
user.account-creation-success-text: Account created successfully. An email has been sent to "{0}". Please confirm your account by following the link in the email before logging in.
user.sign-in-link: Already have an account? Sign in
user.email-does-not-exist: Error: User with email "{0}" does not exist.
user.password-reset-email-sent-success-text: An email has been sent to "{0}". Please follow the link in the email to set a new password for your account.
user.user-not-found-reset-password: User not found. Please check the link you received by email or try again to request a reset of your password.
user.change-password-success: Password changed successfully. You can now log in with your new password.
user.old-password-incorrect: Error: the old password is incorrect.
user.new-password-identical: Error: the new password is identical to the old one.
user.password-change-email-sent-success-text: An email has been sent to "{0}". Please follow the link in the email to change your password.
user.modify-password-popup-text: An email will be sent to "{0}". You will need to follow the link in the email to change your password.
user.email-change-success: Success. An email has been sent to confirm your new email address. After you confirm your email address, please re-log in.
user.new-email-identical: Error: The new email address "{0}" is identical to the current one.
user.new-email-already-existing: Error: The email address "{0}" is already associated with another account.
user.user-not-found-confirm-account: Invalid link. Please check the link you received by email.
user.confirm-account-twice: You have already validated your account. You can now sign in.
user.account-validated: Your account is now validated. Welcome to ReDoPe! You can now sign in.

datasource.name: Name
datasource.port-helper-text: Port number must be between 1 and 65,535.
datasource.configure-cataloging: Configure the cataloging of the datasource:
datasource.datasource-ratio-card: {0} personnal data found among {1} data scanned.
datasource.explanation-parameters-p1: If you only fill the name, the targeted elements will be those which have exactly this name.
datasource.explanation-parameters-p2: If you add * before, the targeted elements will be those which end with this name.
datasource.explanation-parameters-p3: If you add * behind, the targeted elements will be those which begin with this name.
datasource.explanation-parameters-p4: If you add * before AND behind, the targeted elements will be those which contain this name.
datasource.datasource-name-error: Error: A datasource named {0} already exists.
datasource.limit-helper-text: The sample limit must be a positive integer.

sampling-method.NrandomWithRatio: Random percentage of values with limit

sampling-methods-explanation.p1: These methods are used to select sample values among a dataset in order to minimize the computing time.
sampling-methods-explanation.p2: This method selects the first values of the dataset with the input limit as the maximum amount of samples.
sampling-methods-explanation.p3: This method selects random values in the dataset with the input limit as the maximum amount of samples.
sampling-methods-explanation.p4: This method selects random values in the dataset with the input ratio as the total percentage of samples.
sampling-methods-explanation.title5: Random percentage of values with limit
sampling-methods-explanation.p5: This method selects the first values of the dataset with the input ratio as the total percentage of samples but with the input limit as the maximum amount of these samples.
